languages.text: "Полагаю, губернатор не желает оставаться без личной охраны — даже за метровыми стенами бункера. Весьма типично".

traits.locale_text: "Этот бункер построен по новым параметрам и, на первый взгляд, уступает в безопасности более старым имперским убежищам... Хотя, пока что он справляется со своей основной задачей".
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "I presume it is because the governor does not wish to be without his personal guard — even behind the metre-thick walls of his bunker. Typical."
languages.original_text: "Полагаю, губернатор не желает оставаться без личной охраны — даже за метровыми стенами бункера. Весьма типично".

traits.locale_text: "I presume it is because the governor does not wish to be without his personal guard — even behind the metre-thick walls of his bunker. Typical."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I presume it is because the governor does not wish to be without his personal guard — even behind the metre-thick walls of his bunker. Typical."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I presume it is because the governor does not wish to be without his personal guard — even behind the metre-thick walls of his bunker. Typical."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I presume it is because the governor does not wish to be without his personal guard — even behind the metre-thick walls of his bunker. Typical."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “我猜是因为总督不想离开他的私人卫队。即使躲在地堡几米厚的高墙后面，他也依然是这么贪生怕死，真是不出所料。”
languages.original_text: "I presume it is because the governor does not wish to be without his personal guard — even behind the metre-thick walls of his bunker. Typical."

traits.locale_text: “我猜是因为总督不想离开他的私人卫队。即使躲在地堡几米厚的高墙后面，他也依然是这么贪生怕死，真是不出所料。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Presumo que se debe a que alguien no quiere prescindir de su guardia personal, ni tan siquiera detrás de los metros de anchura de los muros de su búnker. Típico».
languages.original_text: "I presume it is because the governor does not wish to be without his personal guard — even behind the metre-thick walls of his bunker. Typical."

traits.locale_text: «Presumo que se debe a que alguien no quiere prescindir de su guardia personal, ni tan siquiera detrás de los metros de anchura de los muros de su búnker. Típico».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「厚さ1メートルのバンカーの中に隠れていようとも、総督は己の護衛がいないことを望まぬからだろう。典型的な者だな」
languages.original_text: "I presume it is because the governor does not wish to be without his personal guard — even behind the metre-thick walls of his bunker. Typical."

traits.locale_text: 「厚さ1メートルのバンカーの中に隠れていようとも、総督は己の護衛がいないことを望まぬからだろう。典型的な者だな」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Vermutlich weil der Gouverneur nicht ohne seine persönliche Wache auskommt ... nicht einmal hinter den meterdicken Mauern seines Bunkers. Typisch."
languages.original_text: "I presume it is because the governor does not wish to be without his personal guard — even behind the metre-thick walls of his bunker. Typical."

traits.locale_text: "Vermutlich weil der Gouverneur nicht ohne seine persönliche Wache auskommt ... nicht einmal hinter den meterdicken Mauern seines Bunkers. Typisch."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « J'imagine que le gouverneur ne veut pas se priver de sa garde personnelle, même bien à l'abri dans son bunker. C'est classique. »
languages.original_text: "I presume it is because the governor does not wish to be without his personal guard — even behind the metre-thick walls of his bunker. Typical."

traits.locale_text: « J'imagine que le gouverneur ne veut pas se priver de sa garde personnelle, même bien à l'abri dans son bunker. C'est classique. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Kanımca valinin, sığınağının bir metre kalınlığındaki duvarlarına rağmen şahsi korumalarından uzak kalmak istememesinden kaynaklı. Hiç şaşırmadım."
languages.original_text: "I presume it is because the governor does not wish to be without his personal guard — even behind the metre-thick walls of his bunker. Typical."

traits.locale_text: "Kanımca valinin, sığınağının bir metre kalınlığındaki duvarlarına rağmen şahsi korumalarından uzak kalmak istememesinden kaynaklı. Hiç şaşırmadım."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
